resources.string: Panda also known as panda bear is a bear native to south central China. It is easily recognized by the large, distinctive black patches around its eyes, over the ears, and across its round body.
Bears have large bodies with stocky legs, long snouts, shaggy hair, plantigrade paws with five nonretractile claws, and short tails.
Koala is a native to Australia. It is easily recognisable by its stout, tailless body; round, fluffy ears; and large, spoon-shaped nose.

The giraffe is an African even-toed ungulate mammal, the tallest living terrestrial animal and the largest ruminant. It has camel-like appearance and the patches of color on its fur. It has extremely long neck and legs, its horn-like ossicones, and its distinctive coat patterns.

The tiger is the largest cat species, reaching a total body length of up to 3.38 m (11.1 ft) over curves and weighing up to 388.7 kg (857 lb) in the wild. Its most recognisable feature is a pattern of dark vertical stripes on reddish-orange fur with a lighter underside.
Zoo is situated at 500 ElCamino Real, Santa Clara, CA - 95050
